page.title: 08CATTLE FARMING IN EDDERTON
page.content: One of Edderton's main industries is {Cattle Farming.}At Dounie Farm a farmer and his two sons work a typical farm.They have 82 cattle,80 of them are cows and there are 2 bulls,and 78 calves.The farmer grows most of his own crops mainly oats,barley,turnip and grass.He owns 162 hectares of land.In spring he has to{calf}the cows,{plough}the fields,{sow}the crops and{spray}the fields.Then in summer he has to finish spraying the fields,{cut the hay,{bale}the hay and make silage. In autumn they are involved in the {harvest,cutting}and{baling}the corn. This is when they{sell}most of their calves.In winter they{take}in the cows and calves,which have been out the rest of the year,and then{feed}them.If they have enough time they{repair machinery.It is a hard life but a very enjoyable one.
